data.description: Sass/SCSS support in Dancer web apps
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Namespace choice: It's a Dancer plugin that processes Sass/SCSS
    files.

    Uniqueness of my approach: It provides similiar functionality as
    Plack::Middleware::File::Sass, but it's easier to set up in a Dancer
    app, has more features, and does not require the Dancer app to be
    run on Plack.

    Why it should be listed: It might be useful. I know at least one
    person who would use it (and it's not me).
